pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.description: The coziest of the bunch, able to burn all those who touch it.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.description: The silliest, and most moist baby.

pokemon.name: Espeon
pokemon.description: Able to feed itself using its tetekenetic abilities.

pokemon.name: Umbreon
pokemon.description: The best doge born on the moon, and sent to us as god's gracious dark angel.

pokemon.name: Glaceon
pokemon.description: The coldest of little girls, and is able to freeze solid all that it touches.

pokemon.name: Sylveon
pokemon.description: It do got a giant bow though.
